website_summaries.verdict: An Allure award-winning charcoal mud mask that combats oily skin without excessively drying you out.
pros: Shrinks pores and removes blackheads without drying out your skin
Easy to put on and wash off
cons: May be too strong for sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: One of the best charcoal mud mask I've purchased.
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick! I've used every other day since I got it. My face feels so clean & is soft, soft after use. Would recommend & will definitely be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: MicMic

customer_reviews.title: I really like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. Whitehead’s I’ve been trying to get rid of for YEARS are coming off. Love the way it leaves my skin. Good product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: E. Stanford

customer_reviews.title: BLACK MAGIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS MASK! FIVE STARS! Improves texture, minimizes break outs, moisturizes, the list goes on! Prime face using sauna, steam, or hot tub BEFORE application for best results! Remove in shower, or have plenty of black towels on hand! FineVine PLEASE sell in travel size. (It is a pain to transfer from this tub into smaller receptacles for my carry-on!)
customer_reviews.author: SHANNA LIVINGSTON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! I felt so refreshed after I’ve used it. Will definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: tak

customer_reviews.title: It definitely is a great product. Makes your skin smooth and feels refreshing
customer_reviews.text: It definitely is a great product. Makes your skin smooth and feels refreshing. Can't wait to use more often to see how better it gets. I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: NSD

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good mask. Me and my son have used it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good mask. Me and my son have used it. He liked how it helped with his blackheads.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Can Feel the Difference
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The very first time I used this mask, I could feel it working within minutes. After rinsing it off, my skin was unbelievably soft. I just received it a few days ago and have only used it once, but I look forward to applying it every few days to help my skin look and feel better.
customer_reviews.author: J. Motley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sucked all the oil and dirt out of my skin
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Davis

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me at all.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a mask to help clear my skin of blackheads and make my pores look a bit smaller. Instead this mask just made my skin look sallow, with any active pimples looking bright red against my pale skin, and I didn't see any clearing at all! It also dried my skin out. I just can't recommend this to anyone, and don't know what to do with what's left in the jar. For reference, I tried this product 3 times with similar results. I had been using a dead sea mud mask and that has much better effects for my combination skin, so if you don't get what you're looking for here maybe try a mud mask instead.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Harsh to the face
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a few times and i've enjoyed using it. It does minimize the pores well and give my face an overall glowing appearance. However, it does not hold up to other masks I've purchased, but for the price you can't complain. It was too harsh for my girlfriend to use though, it left red marks all over her face. She used for 20-25 minutes. She did try to only have it on for 10-15 and was fine, however she didn't seem to get the benefits of the mask in that time frame.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: First time trying an activated charcoal facial mask
customer_reviews.text: First time trying an activated charcoal facial mask and it delivered as promised! I'm 58 w dry areas that need exfoliating and a t-zone that's oily w large pores. This product goes on moist almost gel- like and did a deep cleanse. My skin felt clean and detoxed, pores were minimized. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for all skin types even sensitive ones.
customer_reviews.text: I have been dying to do a face mask, but was worried about one that you pull off. This is an awesome alternative. The mask went on smooth and didn't use that much to cover my face. I did test it on my hand since I have sensitive skin and had no issues. Even thought you don't pull this off, it is still better to avoid hair when you can. I was excited with how smooth my skin was after removing the mask. I am looking forward to adding this to my beauty routine.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Teixeira

customer_reviews.title: Best face mask
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mask avs the seller is great to do business with.
customer_reviews.author: Star Stockbridge

customer_reviews.title: Mold Spores :(
customer_reviews.text: Mine also arrived with mold spores, so I’ll be sending it back. I am disappointed I was excited to try this!
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Bacteria spores in product.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I was not able to try the product because after opening the sealed container I found several bacteria spores. Not going to put that on my face :(
customer_reviews.author: Austin Trent

customer_reviews.title: It is impossible to use.
customer_reviews.text: It is impossible to use. There is a cream that is not only difficult to spread on the face, but NEVER comes off as promised in the photos, never fulfilled its usefulness, it is not possible to use it, the cream seems a lot of bitumen ... finally after several Attempts always ended up washing my face and removing the black dots with something else. DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I misinterpreted what the product was initially. Haha. Thought it was one of the peelable masks. Once getting the product I realized my error, but decided to try it anyways. I work in a machine shop, so I deal with getting oil and coolant on my face and skin regularly. After using this a couple times I've noticed my skin has cleared up a fair amount compared to before. I only gave it 4 stars based on the fact that I've never used a similar product before, so I'm not sure how it compares to others, but since I've noticed positive results I thought it deserved a positive review/rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Subtle but effective
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it a few times so far and had my partner try it too. You don’t need a super thick layer of it, just enough to not see through to your skin. It’s helped clear our breakouts without irritating the skin. No redness, even on his very sensitive skin. Using this mud mask once a week with a clay mask once a week is a great remedy for a breakout. It’s a great mask but I think better accompanied by other remedies you’re using to treat your skin. Doing a peel is also a great think to do once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, easy to use, not so easy to take off unless you use a washcloth.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it about a week but it seems to be doing as advertised. If you leave it on for the instructed 20-30 minutes, you can actually feel it on your face tightening as it dries. It doesn't come off easily with warm water though, you gotta get in there and remove it physically with your hands. I'd recommend using a warm water soaked washcloth for easier removal.
customer_reviews.author: carlos shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Itching and Burning
customer_reviews.text: First use was enough for me. It cause major itching and burned my face leaving it red and blotchy. It then peeled from being burnt. I've used other charcoal masks with no problems, so I'm not sure what's in this one causing these side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Can Feel It Working
customer_reviews.text: Just got the product and have used it once. I definitely could feel something happening - much more so than compared to other masks. Afterwords, my skin felt and looked improved. It did cause some itchy sensation at the end when the mask was nearly dry. But the result was worth it. I will keep using this.
customer_reviews.author: Roddy

customer_reviews.title: Not great for me, at all :(
customer_reviews.text: I can’t give this anymore stars because my experience wasn’t good at all. The directions were to put a thick layer on, and I did. It took over an hour to dry, and it didn’t even fully dry. It didn’t work when I washed my face for 30 MINUTES to get it off, so I had to scrape off the mask with a brush. I ended up getting red marks all over my face the next day. It didn’t work for me, which is why my review is low. But if it works for someone else, that’s good; my experience wasn’t good at all though.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not great in my experience
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a great buy after doing a lot of daily masks to create glowing skin I was told to us this to bring the pimples out from underneath. I saw all the good reviews and I though it would be good, but I did not get very good results. After this experience I have come to the determination it is better to just use things that are clinically approved by profesionals
customer_reviews.author: william d.

customer_reviews.title: Was looking forward to using, but product came Moldy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to using this, but when I opened there where a bunch of white mold spots.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Works Really Well
customer_reviews.text: I'm thoroughly impressed with this activated charcoal mask. It's cheaper than a lot of the name brand products I've tried over the years, but it seems to be working much better. I'm still on my first tub of this stuff, but I've been using it weekly and I think my face is looking much better. There's a lot in here, so I'm not sure how many uses I'll get out of it, but it seems like it will be plenty and be a great value. I'll definitely be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Conway Stern

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Pores Like a Dream
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a great, cruelty-free charcoal mask, and I think I finally found it. It goes on smoothly, dries for about 20 minutes, washes off easily with warm water, and afterwards my pores look more refined and my face feels fresh and clean. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jess B.

customer_reviews.title: If I were into masks, I’d marry this one!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 43 year old dude with oily skin, dry skin, blackheads and suffer occasional breakouts. NOT ANYMORE. I saw an incredible difference after one use and have been using 3x per week for the last month. My skin has never looked better. I never review but I had to share.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: I've never used something like this before but I'm glad I tried it. It lasts forever too—I'm on my first purchase and I think its been at least 4 months now. I feel like my skin is clear and soft afterward. It is really black and can be a bit messy if you're not careful but I just use it like once a week before I shower so its no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: TeeTopher

customer_reviews.title: A layer of white fungus when I opened it
customer_reviews.text: When i got the product, there was a top layer of white fungus! Throw it away as I opened it and couldn't return it. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Activated Charcoal Mud Mask - Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Best mask I have ever used! It felt good on my skin, and when it drys up, I can feel it getting tight around my face, plus I feel a bit of stinging and burning, which meant it's getting rid of the blackheads! I recommend this mask! Best item to buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Carter Thiero

customer_reviews.title: This made me breakout like crazy every time I used it
customer_reviews.text: This made me breakout like crazy every time I used it, at first I thought it could be because it was cleaning out my pores so it resulted in gunk coming out but after a month of a full on zit face I decided to stop using. Too harsh for skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Face Mask
customer_reviews.text: This mask is wonderful. I have been trying to find a a mask that makes my skin feel wonderful, by taking all the bad stuff out and tighten my pores and I think we have a winner. This one doesn't stay on very long, and I can feel it working. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D. Tope

customer_reviews.title: There was mold growing in the Mud Mask
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try the product, but there was mold growing on it when I opened it up. I attached a picture too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is really good. I have been looking for a cleansing mask that is suitable for a guy. This is the one .. The first time I used it I could see a difference and it had no smell.. which is important to me. Unlike other trendy masks it not hard to remove. All natural ingredients add to the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Clay fioravanti

customer_reviews.title: dont believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: this is not full activated charcoal and doesn't work as advertised. would have been better off making my own with activated loose charcoal and coconut oil. doesn't pull out the toxins in the skin as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Greatly recommended
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was a peel off mask, but either way I’m not disappointed at all. After I used it daily for about 3-4 days, I noticed all my acne and blackheads and oils were going away. I feel as though if you use it daily then you will have very clean skin.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews before I decided to purchase this and people really seemed to like it. After using it several times I am also giving a very positive review of this. My skin feels great after washing off the mud and my pores appear smaller. Doesn't take very long for it to dry either, probably 15 min or a little less.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works great and feels so good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product!! It makes your face so cool and tingling when it’s working. After washing it off, your face looks so smooth and has a glow about it. I will definitely buy again. Don’t worry about running out right away, they give you plenty!!
customer_reviews.author: Sally T

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: This mask is easy to wash off. I had bad luck with the peel masks & had a much better experience with this. I have sensitive skin & didn't have any problems with this. My face felt clean & I think it really helped clean out my pores.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this ten stars I would! I've been using it weekly for the last few months or so and I can tell a noticeable difference. It really helps to tighten my pores and my skin is always left soft and radiant. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MissReadsALot

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Soft
customer_reviews.text: Not much I didn't like. A little itchy while it dries. Showing that it's working. Washes off pretty easy in the shower. Leaves skin soft and smooth. I use about every fourth or fifth day. Good stuff. Definitely buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love this product I will be purchasing it again I ...
customer_reviews.text: I Love this product I will be purchasing it again I can't believe how much better and softer and firmer my face is since I started using this product I am one happy customer I even purchased some for my sister in law to try and she said she loves it too... Very good product I rated it a 5 ..
customer_reviews.author: D Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Works great. Thinner and more watery than others I've used, but applies easily and stays in place. I also love their toothpaste! Great produ xts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a full jar.
customer_reviews.text: Product was great overall. I was disappointed in the amount the came in the jar. It was a gift so I can't say whether the recipient liked it but I haven't heard any complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Cleans pores
customer_reviews.text: It does clean pores well, blackheads are cleaned. t does cause my face to turn red for a few hours after washed off.
customer_reviews.author: Jean K

customer_reviews.title: Product works great! However
customer_reviews.text: Product works great! However, I do feel a little jipped. Over a fourth of the product is missing and it takes a lot of product for one mask.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: A must in your beauty regiment!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! I am 55 and have bought or tried hundreds of products such as this. You will spend 40 mins of pure spa feeling as the product works its magic. Your skin starts to tighten instantly as it dries and continues the whole time it's on your skin. You feel refreshed and your skin has a visible glow and smoothness after just the first use. Highly recommeded! You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It inches a lot
customer_reviews.text: your skin do look very nice after using it, but it is almost impossible to have it on for the 15-20 mins. It inches a lot
customer_reviews.author: Melipeli

customer_reviews.title: NOT a Peel Off and not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I expected a peel off mask and this was not it.. You have to rinse off the slick mud with water.. The product was not labeled deceptively but I didn't look for that detail..
customer_reviews.author: Reagan S.

customer_reviews.title: Break outs x100
customer_reviews.text: If we're going off value of size for money then sure I suppose it's not too bad. Decent sized tub. But if this is value of effectiveness for money then it's a hard zero. Been using this as described since the middle of july, it's now almost October. All my face has done is significantly break out more. I really wanted to love it... it's exactly as described except for the little "cleanses skin" detail. Will not buy or use again =(
customer_reviews.author: MLEA

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! I’d use it once a week and it made a huge difference on my skin. When I started running low, I ordered a second one to make sure I wouldn’t run out. Then one day I opened the jar and there was mold all over the top of the charcoal. How long had this been molding and I didn’t know about it?! Yuck. Three it away and won’t buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: lvespi

customer_reviews.title: Really deep cleansing!
customer_reviews.text: I used charcoal mask three times a week for pore minimizer and exfoliation. This charcoal and mud mask is also reducing the "sagging chin" and make my chin looks firmer.
customer_reviews.author: N Witt

customer_reviews.title: My face looks amazing after use - face smooth and younger looking
customer_reviews.text: I've used Activated Charcoal Mud Mask almost every night [No instructions re frequency of use]. My face looks amazing after use - face smooth and younger looking, pores smaller and blackheads removed. Easy to use. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Catty

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order. I absolutely love this mask! I use it at least 2-3 times a week. It softens/smooths, minimizes my pores, and de-puffs under eye. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: I have not found this product to be helpful. I used according to instructions and noticed no difference. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ivana Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 yo daughter. After the first use her face looked cleaner/clearer and definitely is helping with her break outs of acne. Great product so far
customer_reviews.author: Man with plan

customer_reviews.title: This seems to work a lot better then the African black soap clarifying mud mask I ...
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work a lot better then the African black soap clarifying mud mask I use to it. I actually feel it shrinking my pores and clearing my black heads that I would get from time to time. I will continue to use this product and yes i would buy it again. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: They said put a thick layer, I think I went a bit too thick so drying time was longer than stated so don't go to thick! Otherwise it's great, came off easily (except where I went too thick) and my face looked and felt wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth giving a try.
customer_reviews.text: Still has it on me. I really it.. use it once in a while and it makes my skin feel so smooth and bit tight which I love about this product. Would differently gonna buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RABIYA Fawad

customer_reviews.title: Back to Basics
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this type of mask in years. Sometimes going back to the good old basics is best. Loved this mask, it left my skin glowing, smooth & definitely refreshed. I will definitely buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Itches once dry
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to apply and seems to do the job of helping to clean my pores, but as it dries it gets very itchy on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: MLA-G

customer_reviews.title: New fav mask!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite face mask! Kinda of itches and tightens a lot near the end that it almost hurts lol, but worth it! My skin feels so clean afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Truedson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love love LOVE this mask! It brightened my skin and tightened my pores. I plan on making it a weekly ritual to help my skin glow!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Starr

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I recently started caring for my face more and don’t feel ashamed at all. Just because I’m a man I still need to care for my body. Product works as expected and really helps clear up your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: My face is super soft! I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: First mask was done last night. My face is super soft! I like it a lot UPDATE! I looked in the mirror closely and my nose is completely clear all the blackheads are GONE!!! The main reason for me purchasing this product. IT WORKS!!! I LOVE IT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Huge difference with just the first use. Not being a peel off mask, I was a bit concerned about the exfoliating effects. There was no reason to be. Plus.....no pain with the peeling it off. Love it. Will order it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rafnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product - great result!
customer_reviews.text: Love the mask. It has a nice thickness. Dries and hardens nicely. My pores look smaller after only two uses. It makes my skin very soft. I was well pleased with my purchase. I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ctivated Charcoal Mud Mask
customer_reviews.text: works great for closing pores and leaving the face clean and fresh. Recommend for weekly use.
customer_reviews.author: laney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!- 2nd review
customer_reviews.text: 2nd review- Still an amazing product. This is my second time purchasing it and results are superb. I have been telling my friends to go give it a try and they were very happy as well with the results. I would definitely use this product for years now. Kudos! 1st review- The best mask I’ve tried in years. Immediate results. Very satisfied customer here. Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This mask makes my face feel very smooth and clean after use.
customer_reviews.author: Cghost

customer_reviews.title: Good face mask
customer_reviews.text: Very nice face mask, a little hard to get off. Don’t leave it on too long and don’t spread it too thick. I left it on too long the first time and my face got red and irritated
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great for overall skin care
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product a couple times now in my first week of having it. I think it is an amazing product. For someone who has battled with acne most of her life this product does really help with that. I'm not sure over long term use how it will affect me but so far it seems to be working great! Thank you Finevine for an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Moriah

customer_reviews.title: good mask
customer_reviews.text: It does the job and leaves my skin very clean but a little drier
customer_reviews.author: VStylist

customer_reviews.title: Organic
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that product is organic. I have been using it for about two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: musrrat hakim

customer_reviews.title: A must for at home spa/ me time
customer_reviews.text: This product was intended to help me with my skin which has changed a bit from my younger years. I loved how tight it got as it dried. When I rinsed, baby soft skin was underneath.
customer_reviews.author: V. Pain

customer_reviews.title: Best mud mask. Make in US
customer_reviews.text: I got first time use mud mask and it was sooo awesome! Look different than before. More bright and clean. I am agree with other people comment on the reviews. Best star is 5! Wow! I like it!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and remove
customer_reviews.text: Very good mask for oily skin. Moisturizing afterwards is a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: MARIEN SANTANA

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: Not one to usually leave reviews but this product deserves one. I’m 22 with sensitive skin , and have mildly been breaking out. After my first use of only 12 minutes my face never looked smoother or felt fresher! My acne scars even look less noticeable after just one use.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mask! You can really feel it working! It makes my skin look nicer definitely!
customer_reviews.author: Out in the Country

customer_reviews.title: BE VERY CAREFUL YOU BREAK OUT ALMOST IMMEDIATELY
customer_reviews.text: This was actually horrible I used it once my face broke out unbelievably, I read all the reviews an that’s why I purchased it but absolutely not I wish I could get a refund never again....
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Lead to a breakout
customer_reviews.text: I've never had bad acne before, only a few pimples here and there but I thought this would feel nice and just make my skin overall more healthy. After using this product twice, I got my first breakout ever. I'm 20 for reference and I followed all the instructions included with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Not what i though & wanted. It’s a good product. Just not what i thought it was. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask 🤩
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!! My skin looked and felt so smooth after one application! I recommend scooping out less then a tablespoon for your face. My pores looked smaller and redness of acne I have seemed calmer too!! Love this mask! Specially since I don’t have to peel it off too 🤩
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tunred My Skin Bright Red
customer_reviews.text: I do not have sensitive skin and never have reactions to products like this, but after I used this for the first time, my face was red and looked sunburned. Thankfully it went away before work the next day, but it was unsettling enough that I won't use this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product because it was very easy to use but a bit hard to take off....but overall this product does work and is oddly satisfying to not only put on but to take off....it also makes your skin feel very fresh whenever you're finished.
customer_reviews.author: Keelin Paige

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product twice since getting it and I have to say it's works really well. My nose looks clear, it didn't dry out my skin like other charcoal products in the past has done. I don't know how you can go wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: William F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this product but I really like it. Seems to remove any little blackheads & leaves skin very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Judie Collins

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin feeling fresh
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It is hard to find a charcoal mask that didnt have a lot of fruit extract in them. As I have an intolerance to fruit I needed a good alternative that had the other ingredients I want like charcoal. So far, this id working well for me and improving my skin as well.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Harpine

customer_reviews.title: Boomshakalaka!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 17 year old daughter and 13 year old niece. They use it all the time and love it! They say it makes their skin soft and it seems to be helping my daughter with her acne. Two thumbs up for this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping only used product 1 time but it did leave my skin feeling very soft

customer_reviews.title: This is excellent mask.
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent mask... I'm 34 years olds and my skin looks smooth and fresh.. I recommend this mask if you are that kind of person who takes care your skin specially the face.

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement!
customer_reviews.text: Face feels cleaner and smoother. The pores on my chin and nose seem less noticeable. Even though I am older, I have a T-zone problem and the mask definitely helps!

customer_reviews.text: I love this mask!! My face has never felt so good. It was very quick shipping and the product was excellent!

customer_reviews.text: I only gave it a 1 because they didn't have zero as an option. This product is supposed to be for all skin types. It broke my face out all over suck liars 0
